title: Banning man killed in smoke shop shoot out in San Bernardino
content:
Three of the five victims were found Monday night inside the ND Vape shop on Baseline Street.
A fourth person was found outside on a sidewalk. That victim, a 24-year-old man from Banning, died from his injuries.
A fifth victim was found behind the smoke shop near a grocery store. Investigators say that person likely collapsed while running away from the gunfire.
Police say four of the victims were men and one was a woman.
Detectives are looking for two suspects.
